name: WhiteNoiseMountainSounds
0:
”Alexa, open white noise mountain sounds”
”Alexa, start white noise mountain sounds”
”Alexa, launch white noise mountain sounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: white noise mountain sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
White Noise: Mountain Sounds lets you reproduce wonderful rain audio tracks to help you fall asleep, concentrate or study.
To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram!
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
